title: Spoon
description: Spoon, reddish brown with narrow bowl; long broad flat tapering handle curved on the back and slightly concave on the front in sections. The handle decorated with incised decoration of a band of animals, at the bottom a shark-head with characteristic down turned mouth and many teeth, above him a squatting unidentified animal, above him a third animal, probably a frog.
creditline: Gift of Mr. Harry E. Wood
